entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon then west 20 gusting to 40. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
